TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Majia, title = Majia, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Majia} }

S.FORM: Majia Majia a sakuwan ku Pingtung. kumud nu kalesakan, 61.68 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 11.05 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 49.62 km²), u kasabinawlan, 6,757 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 2,029 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 6,507 ku yincumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 96%(Paiwan, Rukai) ku kasabinawlan. u Paiwan atu Rukai ku sakalaniyazu'. nikasakuwakuwan Majia mala 6 a cuwen atu 10 ku niyazu'. kina 10 a niyazu'sa, Paljur , Zayazayan , Vecekadan , Laulauzan , Payuwan , Kazangiljan , Wakaba , Masilid , Makazayazaya , Tjanavakung . Majia a kenis (Paywan a kamu:Makazayazaya)tini i Taywan Ping-dung akuwan nuwalian satipan, nuwamisan micapi tu San-ti-men a kenis, satimulan atu saamisan mitules tu Wu-tay a kenis, satipan belaw u Ney-bu a kenis, satipan nutimulan mitules tu Wan-luan a kenis, mutinulan mitules tu Tay-u a kenis, nu Taywan uynian a dubal adidi' ku hekal caay ka edem tu cacay lasubu ping-bang-kung-li buyu'ay a yincumin a kenis. uynian a kenis zumaay Fey-di San-he a niyazu', maemic i Cang-ce-a kenis, Ne-pu a kenis atu Yin-pu a kenis a laed. uynian a kenis kakitizaan i satimulan nu Cung-yan-san-may, Ta-u a buyu' tu samisan, u lala' katalawan, caay ka lecad ku kasaenal, demiad tungusay caledes kasabalian a demiad, labu nu kenis a tademaw angangan nu Taywan Yin -cu-min Paiwan a binacadan. laylay (Makazayazaya), (Payuan) ,一直由Vavulengan Vavulengan當家長嗣為徐春美(Eleng Vavulengan), (Tjaugadu)家族擔任領導. Majia a kenis u Paywan nu Makazayazaya Ma-suy-li-de, Wa-ka-pa, Ka-ca-ci-lan, Payuan tu pienengan,Makazayazaya i kamu nu Paiwan u "matekinihay a lala' han", u imi uyzaan a niyazu' pienengan i kalikidan nu nanum tu masaapilisay a lala'an, Majia i nu kasumamadan ayaw nu pikuwan nu Lipun a ziday, mahiza tu uiya ci Vavulengan a tumuk a lalumaan tungus mala u satalakaway nu mukeliday, i mahini ci Vavulengan malau sakakaay a wawa ci Eleng Vavulengan, imahini uynian lalabu nu luma' izaw kunisulitan katukuh sabaw enem a iluc, Paiwan kakitizaan u Paiwan ci Tjaugadu a lalumaan ku mala mikeliday. pikuwaan nu Lipun a ziday mabulaw ku zuma' a tademaw, patizeng tu kakitizaan nu Taylin milisimet tu kawaw, i 1920 a mihcaan a kakitizaan misumat tu lice makakenis tungus tu nu Kaw-sing zou-caw zou-cun, zikuzan nu ngangayaw hawsa saayaway uynian limaay a niyazu' pasumat han ngangan u Majia, pay-ye, Ling-san, Cia-i', Ba-wan satu pangangan aca Paywan han, zayhan nisulitan i cudad tu nakamuwan laylay nu Ta-u a buyu' "Kavulugan" sanay sa, Payuan a niyazu' nu Taywan yincumin Paywan a binacadan lalekalan a lala', uyza sa makay Taywan Seng-cen-fu i 1986 a mihcaan sepat a bulad tusa a demiad uyni a ngiha' ku patelacay Fa-wan a niyazu' pangangan Paywan a niyazu', na u yaanay nipanutekan kenis a ngangan u "Ma-cya-sa" han, namahiza sa i 1946 a mihcaan pasumat Majia a kenis han tu, kakenis tungus nu Kaw-sing akuwan ku mikuwanay, 1950 a mihcaan pasumat tungusay tu nu Pin-tung akuwan katukuh ayza. piidangan Taywan yincumin piazihan tu lalangawan nuwamisan Ta-wu a buyu' tu satipan a cascas nu batu'ay a luma' nu Paiwan a binacadan Ping-tung Majia a kenis piidangan tu malukay mibutingay a kakitizaan Fa-wan-se-lu malumanay a kasaniyazu' kasumamadan nisubelidan tu tuud Pay-ping a buyu' Ping-tung kapahay salunganay a pilapinan Lian-san a cascas Li-na-li a niyazu' Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw/Shanchuan Glass Suspension Bridge Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw tini i Taywan Maw-lin piazihan tu hekal nu kantal a kakitizaan, mitulesay tu Ping-tung akuwan San-ti-men a kenis atu Majia a kenis tu caculilang nu tademaw cuyacuy a sangaw, miawas tu Kaw-ping sauwac adidi'ay cilis Ay-liaw a sauwac, u uzip nu sangaw u masacuyacuyay a sangaw, katanayu' a sangaw 262 kung-ce, laed tu sauwac palalecad tu talakaw sepat bataan izaw ku lima debah, nau satanayaay masacuyacuay a sangaw, katukuh 2017 a mihcaan u Tuing atuse Fu-sing a kakitizaan u baluhay a sacumud nu sauwac cuyavuy a sangaw "katanayu' nu sangaw 303 debah malakuit tuway". Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw/Shanchuan Glass Suspension Bridge u satakus tu Ping-tung akuwan San-ti-men a kenis San-ti a niyazu' atu Majia a kenis Pa-ye a niyazu' tu cuyacuy a sangaw, tunusay masacuyacuyay a sangaw, u sakatuuday pitubian tu tademaw cacay lasubu, Liu-li-cu a sakahini tu pipazeng nu Paiwan a binacadan a Yi-su-ciya ci Sa-ku-liw-pa-wa-wa-lung mibihekacan a misanga', u uzip nu sangaw tusaay a takinilan izaw kunipazeng tu tulu bataan izaw ku tusa a paya' tu kungku, nusakamu 32 masazumaay a kungku nu niyazu', cuyacuy a sangaw i sacumut atu katukuhan patizeng tu Ma-say-ke yi-su-zuo-pin atu tabakiay a ba'tu kunipazeng tu yi-su. uzip tu sangaw tusa a takinilan pahezek tu pitanam katukuh tatengaay tu amiculul a demiadan micunus tu mipazeng tu 1,664 ku Liu-li-cu. malumanay a Fa-wan a niyazu' na u Paiwanay tu ,Rukai a binacadan u lalangawan a tuas ulalekalan a lala' nu tuas, malumanay a Fa-wan u talakaw pakala tu 800 debah, ba'tuay aluma' micangday tu butu' amipatizeng atu nu ayawan a buyu' tu Se-lu, Kaw-yan atu kapahay aucya niyazu' silaed tu ai-liau nutimulan a sauwac, ilabu ku kakitizaan nu Paiwan a binacadan a kakawsan a buyu' "Ta-uw a buyu'", kasilut nu Paiwan a binacadan ba'tuay a luma' masupet u masakapahay malisimed u mahiniay nusuayaway tu butu' micapiay tu nanum, u satalakaway a maazih ku kakitizaan a lala' pawapen tu kasumamadanay tu Fa-wan a tademaw lihalay kunikauzip, uyza sa amitena' tu miubiay tu kapahay a ucya, i saayaway a mihcaan u Fa-wan niyazu' a tademaw katukuh tu cacay lasubu kayadah ku luma', u pikuwanay nu Lipun a ziday Lipun a tademaw napacici tu Se-lu atu Kaw-yan tusaay niyazu'an a tademaw, mabulaw tayza i Fa-wan, Taywan napatizang hawsa ku-min-cen-bu pasilut aca tu tuluay niyazu' a tademaw mabulaw ku niyazu' tayza i ayzaay Pa-yia, Majia atu Fa-wan a niyazu', nauyaanan u Fa-wan a niyazu' pasumad han ku ngangan u malumanay Fa-wan. nipalumaan mang-gu yincumin nituktukan atu nalimaan Majia a niyazu' lalekalan a kungku nu babalaki nu Taywan Paiwan a binacadan Majia a niyazu' "Paiwan a kamu, Makazayazaya, tini i Pin-tung akuwan Majia a niyazu' a niyazu'" lalekalan a kungku nu babalaki, uyni u tumuk kalecuhan u angangan nilaculan. kasumamadan a zitay , izaw kya cacay a tademaw makayba'tu tahkal, izaw ku nu dituay a icelangciniza miawza tu tademaw, satu auynian misaupu tu katuuday a tademaw, patizeng tu niyazu', mala u tumuk nuheni.

Majia Majia a sakowan ko Pingtong. komod no kalesakan, 61.68 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 11.05 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 49.62 km²), o kasabinawlan, 6,757 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 2,029 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 6,507 ko yincomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 96%(Paiwan, Rokai) ko kasabinawlan. o Paiwan ato Rokai ko sakalaniyazo'. nikasakowakowan Majia mala 6 a cowen ato 10 ko niyazo'. kina 10 a niyazo'sa, Paljor , Zayazayan , Vecekadan , Laolaozan , Payowan , Kazangiljan , Wakaba , Masilid , Makazayazaya , Tjanavakong . Majia a kenis (Paywan a kamo:Makazayazaya)tini i Taywan Ping-dong akowan nowalian satipan, nowamisan micapi to San-ti-men a kenis, satimolan ato saamisan mitoles to Wo-tay a kenis, satipan belaw o Ney-bo a kenis, satipan notimolan mitoles to Wan-loan a kenis, motinolan mitoles to Tay-o a kenis, no Taywan oynian a dobal adidi' ko hekal caay ka edem to cacay lasobo ping-bang-kong-li boyo'ay a yincomin a kenis. oynian a kenis zomaay Fey-di San-he a niyazo', maemic i Cang-ce-a kenis, Ne-po a kenis ato Yin-po a kenis a laed. oynian a kenis kakitizaan i satimolan no Cong-yan-san-may, Ta-o a boyo' to samisan, o lala' katalawan, caay ka lecad ko kasaenal, demiad tongosay caledes kasabalian a demiad, labo no kenis a tademaw angangan no Taywan Yin -co-min Paiwan a binacadan. laylay (Makazayazaya), (Payoan) ,一直由Vavolengan Vavolengan當家長嗣為徐春美(Eleng Vavolengan), (Tjaogado)家族擔任領導. Majia a kenis o Paywan no Makazayazaya Ma-soy-li-de, Wa-ka-pa, Ka-ca-ci-lan, Payoan to pienengan,Makazayazaya i kamo no Paiwan o "matekinihay a lala' han", o imi oyzaan a niyazo' pienengan i kalikidan no nanom to masaapilisay a lala'an, Majia i no kasomamadan ayaw no pikowan no Lipon a ziday, mahiza to oiya ci Vavolengan a tomok a lalomaan tongos mala o satalakaway no mokeliday, i mahini ci Vavolengan malao sakakaay a wawa ci Eleng Vavolengan, imahini oynian lalabo no loma' izaw konisolitan katokoh sabaw enem a iloc, Paiwan kakitizaan o Paiwan ci Tjaogado a lalomaan ko mala mikeliday. pikowaan no Lipon a ziday mabolaw ko zoma' a tademaw, patizeng to kakitizaan no Taylin milisimet to kawaw, i 1920 a mihcaan a kakitizaan misomat to lice makakenis tongos to no Kaw-sing zoo-caw zoo-con, zikozan no ngangayaw hawsa saayaway oynian limaay a niyazo' pasomat han ngangan o Majia, pay-ye, Ling-san, Cia-i', Ba-wan sato pangangan aca Paywan han, zayhan nisolitan i codad to nakamowan laylay no Ta-o a boyo' "Kavologan" sanay sa, Payoan a niyazo' no Taywan yincomin Paywan a binacadan lalekalan a lala', oyza sa makay Taywan Seng-cen-fo i 1986 a mihcaan sepat a bolad tosa a demiad oyni a ngiha' ko patelacay Fa-wan a niyazo' pangangan Paywan a niyazo', na o yaanay nipanotekan kenis a ngangan o "Ma-cya-sa" han, namahiza sa i 1946 a mihcaan pasomat Majia a kenis han to, kakenis tongos no Kaw-sing akowan ko mikowanay, 1950 a mihcaan pasomat tongosay to no Pin-tong akowan katokoh ayza. piidangan Taywan yincomin piazihan to lalangawan nowamisan Ta-wo a boyo' to satipan a cascas no bato'ay a loma' no Paiwan a binacadan Ping-tong Majia a kenis piidangan to malokay mibotingay a kakitizaan Fa-wan-se-lo malomanay a kasaniyazo' kasomamadan nisobelidan to tood Pay-ping a boyo' Ping-tong kapahay salonganay a pilapinan Lian-san a cascas Li-na-li a niyazo' Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw/Shanchoan Glass Sospension Bridge Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw tini i Taywan Maw-lin piazihan to hekal no kantal a kakitizaan, mitolesay to Ping-tong akowan San-ti-men a kenis ato Majia a kenis to cacolilang no tademaw coyacoy a sangaw, miawas to Kaw-ping saowac adidi'ay cilis Ay-liaw a saowac, o ozip no sangaw o masacoyacoyay a sangaw, katanayo' a sangaw 262 kong-ce, laed to saowac palalecad to talakaw sepat bataan izaw ko lima debah, nao satanayaay masacoyacoay a sangaw, katokoh 2017 a mihcaan o Toing atose Fo-sing a kakitizaan o balohay a sacomod no saowac coyavoy a sangaw "katanayo' no sangaw 303 debah malakoit toway". Shan-choan coyacoy a sangaw/Shanchoan Glass Sospension Bridge o satakos to Ping-tong akowan San-ti-men a kenis San-ti a niyazo' ato Majia a kenis Pa-ye a niyazo' to coyacoy a sangaw, tonosay masacoyacoyay a sangaw, o sakatooday pitobian to tademaw cacay lasobo, Lio-li-co a sakahini to pipazeng no Paiwan a binacadan a Yi-so-ciya ci Sa-ko-liw-pa-wa-wa-long mibihekacan a misanga', o ozip no sangaw tosaay a takinilan izaw konipazeng to tolo bataan izaw ko tosa a paya' to kongko, nosakamo 32 masazomaay a kongko no niyazo', coyacoy a sangaw i sacomot ato katokohan patizeng to Ma-say-ke yi-so-zoo-pin ato tabakiay a ba'to konipazeng to yi-so. ozip to sangaw tosa a takinilan pahezek to pitanam katokoh tatengaay to amicolol a demiadan miconos to mipazeng to 1,664 ko Lio-li-co. malomanay a Fa-wan a niyazo' na o Paiwanay to ,Rokai a binacadan o lalangawan a toas olalekalan a lala' no toas, malomanay a Fa-wan o talakaw pakala to 800 debah, ba'toay aloma' micangday to boto' amipatizeng ato no ayawan a boyo' to Se-lo, Kaw-yan ato kapahay aocya niyazo' silaed to ai-liao notimolan a saowac, ilabo ko kakitizaan no Paiwan a binacadan a kakawsan a boyo' "Ta-ow a boyo'", kasilot no Paiwan a binacadan ba'toay a loma' masopet o masakapahay malisimed o mahiniay nosoayaway to boto' micapiay to nanom, o satalakaway a maazih ko kakitizaan a lala' pawapen to kasomamadanay to Fa-wan a tademaw lihalay konikaozip, oyza sa amitena' to miobiay to kapahay a ocya, i saayaway a mihcaan o Fa-wan niyazo' a tademaw katokoh to cacay lasobo kayadah ko loma', o pikowanay no Lipon a ziday Lipon a tademaw napacici to Se-lo ato Kaw-yan tosaay niyazo'an a tademaw, mabolaw tayza i Fa-wan, Taywan napatizang hawsa ko-min-cen-bo pasilot aca to toloay niyazo' a tademaw mabolaw ko niyazo' tayza i ayzaay Pa-yia, Majia ato Fa-wan a niyazo', naoyaanan o Fa-wan a niyazo' pasomad han ko ngangan o malomanay Fa-wan. nipalomaan mang-go yincomin nitoktokan ato nalimaan Majia a niyazo' lalekalan a kongko no babalaki no Taywan Paiwan a binacadan Majia a niyazo' "Paiwan a kamo, Makazayazaya, tini i Pin-tong akowan Majia a niyazo' a niyazo'" lalekalan a kongko no babalaki, oyni o tomok kalecohan o angangan nilacolan. kasomamadan a zitay , izaw kya cacay a tademaw makayba'to tahkal, izaw ko no ditoay a icelangciniza miawza to tademaw, sato aoynian misaopo to katooday a tademaw, patizeng to niyazo', mala o tomok noheni.
